name: High Fructose Corn Syrup
description: You can use Corn instead of Sugar in any Recipe

name: Totally Tacos
description: If you only have Recipes from Taco o Plomo get 12$

name: The Supreme BBQ
description: If you only have Recipes from Grilluminati's BBQ get 12$

name: All Alliums
description: If you have at least 6 Cards total of  Garlic and Onion get 18$

name: Sweet Tooth
description: If you have all three of the Recipes Gelato, Chutney and Milkshake get 8$

name: Curry Completion
description: If you have at least 13 ingredients in the Curry Curry Recipe get 13$

name: Purist
description: If all your Recipes are from one single truck get 8$

name: Rainbow Trucks
description: For each unique Truck you have Recipes from get 3$

name: No Chili Please
description: You can complete any Recipe as if you had Chili without having it

name: Risotto
description: If you have the Pasta Recipe and also Rice get 8$

name: Bean Burger
description: You can use Beans instead of Ground Meat in the Burgers! Recipe

name: Herb Life
description: You can use Cilantro as Basil and Basil as Cilantro in any Recipe

name: Vegan Gelato
description: You can use Tofu to replace Egg and Dairy in the Gelato Recipe

name: Truffle Mayo Burger
description: If you have the Burger! Recpeie and also Egg, Oil and Mushrooms get 9$

name: Masala Master
description: If you have the Curry Curry Recpeie and also 2 Spice Cards get 8$

name: Alambres
description: If you have the Taco Mix Recipe and also Bacon and Cheese get 8$

name: Chicken Satay
description: If you have Chicken, Peanuts, Lime and Chili get 8$

name: Margherita
description: If you have Flour, Cheese and Tomato get 8$

name: Naan Burgers
description: You can use Naan instead of Hamburger Buns in any Recipe

name: Burger Curry
description: You can use Hamburger Buns instead of Naan in any Recipe

name: Fish Sauce
description: If you have Fish and Lime you can complete the Bao Dream Recipe without Hoisin Sauce or Chili Mayo

name: A Bun is a Bun
description: You can use Hamburger Buns instead of Bao Buns and Bao Buns instead of Hamburger Buns in any Recipe

name: Bao to the Taco
description: You can use Bao Buns as Tortilla in any Recipe

name: Everything is a Taco
description: You can use Tortilla as any of Hamburger Buns, Naan and Bao Buns in any Recipe,

name: Um Actually - Peanuts is a Legume
description: You can use Peanuts as Beans and Beans as Peanuts in any Recipe
